import logo from './logo.png'; import './App.css'; import { useState } from 'react' import { ethers } from "ethers" function App() { const [account, setAccount] = useState(null) const web3Handler = async () => { const accounts = await window.etherum.request({method: 'eth_requestAccounts'}); setAccount(accounts[0]) const provider = new ethers.providers.Web3Provider(window.ethereum) const signer = provider.getSigner() loadContracts(signer) } const loadContracts = async (signer) => { con } return (
